pulltitle: Mostly sidebar updates
pullsbody:
Each page can now select which sidebar group it wants to use, so having a 'live' home page should be case of:
- creating a page for the live content
- setting up the sidebar for that page
- setting that page to use the sidebar
- setting the side front page to be that page
- adjusting the front page banner as appropriate

Will make this situation clear elsewhere.
pull_repo_desc: Wordpress theme for 2012 Mozilla Festival site
pull_commit_message: Adding sidebar selector meta box to admin

Due to issues chasing down Gravatar-enabled email addresses, we're going to use Twitter avatars instead if available.

pulltitle: Twitter avatars
pullsbody:
Primary purpose is to get better Twitter integration into user profiles. Because we are evidently having problems tracking down Gravatar-enabled email addresses, which Wordpress uses by default for user avatars, we're making use of the associated Twitter account, if it's available.

Otherwise, a couple of minor bug fixes for styling and Lanyrd-esque link recognition.
pull_repo_desc: Wordpress theme for 2012 Mozilla Festival site
pull_commit_message: Fixing auto-linking for post-link labels

Otherwise, a couple of minor bug fixes for styling and Lanyrd-esque link recognition.
